snippet: Mr. Schmeck covered medical research for The New York Times, where he worked for more than 30 years.
abstract: Harold M Schmeck Jr, science writer for The New York Times for more than 30 years, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Schmeck covered medical research for The New York Times, where he worked for more than 30 years.

headline.seo: Harold M. Schmeck Jr., Times Science Writer, Dies at 89
headline.main: Harold M. Schmeck, 89, Times Science Writer, Dies
headline.print_headline: Harold M. Schmeck Jr., 89, Times Science Writer
